name: Helixe - Air Combat Stories
description:
Cross the sky through a tunnel infested with enemies. Defeat the 4 final guardians to rid the skies of all evil. Collect all the gold you can to improve your plane and become the most acclaimed pilot in the world.

Your progress will not be lost when you close the game, so you can back whenever you want!



NOTE:
The HTML5 version tends to be a bit slow. For best performance, try the mobile version at the link provided.

This is a fully playable OPEN BETA version of this game. All improvements will be uploaded on next few days.
